alert.note: Alert for Coconino; Gila; Yavapai (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 17 at 4:02PM MST until May 17 at 4:45PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: The National Weather Service in Flagstaff has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Gila County in east central Arizona... Coconino County in north central Arizona... Yavapai County in west central Arizona... * Until 445 PM MST. * At 401 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Strawberry, or 14 miles northwest of Payson, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Pine, Strawberry and Geronimo Boy Scout Camp. This includes the following highways... State Route 260 between mile markers 250 and 251. State Route 87 between mile markers 261 and 282. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
